Saba Coffee has quickly become one of my favorite spots. The coffee is consistently smooth, rich, and well-balanced â€” clearly made with care. What really stood out to me, though, was the service. On just my second visit, the barista remembered exactly what I ordered the first time and asked if I wanted "the usual." That small gesture made the whole experience feel warm and personal. It's rare to find that kind of attention to detail, especially so quickly. Definitely a place worth coming back to.

Very kind staff, and the place is great to have a stop at in Haji lane. The ambience is very calming, with a selection of books to view from. They also have comfortable chairs to take a break away from the heat
